Translations.Text: Who is more unjust than he who forges against Allah a lie, or denies His revelations? Verily, the unjust shall not prosper
On the day when We shall gather them all together, then shall We say to those who have associated others with Ourself, "Where now are those associates whom you did invent
Then they will have no excuse but to say, "By Allah our Lord, we did not associate gods with Allah
See how they lie against themselves, and how what they did invent deserts them

And among them are some who listen unto you, but We have placed a veil upon their heart lest they should understand it, and in their ears is deafness; and though they saw each sign they would not believe therein, to the point that when they come to you to
They forbid it and they avoid it; but they destroy none but their own souls, though they perceive not
But could you but see when they are set over the Fire and say, "Would that we were sent back! We would not then deny our LordÂ´s revelations, but we would be of the believers
Nay! Now is shown clearly to them what they did hide before; and were they to be sent back, they would return to that which they were forbidden, for they are liars
They say "There is naught but this life of ours in the world and we shall not be raised again
But could you see when they are set before their Lord, He says, "Is not this the real?" They will say, "Yea, by our Lord!" He will say, "Then taste the penalty because you did disbelieve
